question: Match the parts of the brain given in List I with their functions given in List II.
List I: 1. Medulla oblongata, 2. Hypothalamus, 3. Cerebral cortex, 4. Limbic system
List II: p. Body temperature, q. Olfaction, r. Respiration, s. Motor function
explanation: Medulla oblongata controls respiration (1-r), Hypothalamus regulates body temperature (2-p), Cerebral cortex controls motor functions (3-s), and the Limbic system is involved in olfaction and emotional reactions (4-q).
